body_html:
guys, if you use tensorflow example project (not yours)
you have to determine the correct path for native libraries

for newly created projects in Android Studio it is project_name\app\src\main\jniLibs\armeabi-v7a

for tensorflow example project it is project_name\libs\armeabi-v7a (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/examples/android)
the project overrides default path in build.gradle file: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/examples/android/build.gradle#L130
jniLibs.srcDirs = ['libs']
body_text:
guys, if you use tensorflow example project (not yours)
you have to determine the correct path for native libraries
for newly created projects in Android Studio it is project_name\app\src\main\jniLibs\armeabi-v7a
for tensorflow example project it is project_name\libs\armeabi-v7a (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/examples/android)
the project overrides default path in build.gradle file:  https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/examples/android/build.gradle#L130
jniLibs.srcDirs = ['libs']
body:
guys, if you use _tensorflow example project_ (not yours)
you have to determine the correct path for native libraries

for newly created projects in Android Studio it is **project_name\app\src\main\jniLibs\armeabi-v7a**

for _tensorflow example project_ it is **project_name\libs\armeabi-v7a** (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/examples/android)
the project overrides default path in `build.gradle` file:  https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/examples/android/build.gradle#L130
`jniLibs.srcDirs = ['libs']`
